addSubtitle.title: Add Score Info Message
addSubtitle.defaultValue: Add score enter your score here. You may add more than one score in a day!
addSubtitle.placeholder: Add score enter your score here. You may add more than one score in a day!

editSubtitle.title: Edit Score Info Message
editSubtitle.defaultValue: Enter your score here. You may edit only today's score!
editSubtitle.placeholder: Enter your score here. You may edit only today's score!

nonRankedUserToast.title: Non Ranked User Toast
nonRankedUserToast.defaultValue: You are not ranked in top 100
nonRankedUserToast.placeholder: You are not ranked in top 100

topRankNotificationMessage.title: Top Rank Notification Message
topRankNotificationMessage.defaultValue: ${context.plugin.userName} is now at first place in the ${context.plugin.boardName} board! Can you take over?
topRankNotificationMessage.placeholder: ${context.plugin.userName} is now at first place in the ${context.plugin.boardName} board! Can you take over?

lowerRankNotificationTitle.title: Lower Rank Notification Title
lowerRankNotificationTitle.defaultValue: Things are heating at the top!
lowerRankNotificationTitle.placeholder: Things are heating at the top!

lowerRankNotificationMessage.title: Top Rank Notification Message
lowerRankNotificationMessage.defaultValue: ${context.plugin.userName} is now at ${context.plugin.rank} place from ${context.plugin.oldPositionUser} in the ${context.plugin.boardName} board! Can you take over?
lowerRankNotificationMessage.placeholder: ${context.plugin.userName} is now at ${context.plugin.rank} place from ${context.plugin.oldPositionUser} in the ${context.plugin.boardName} board! Can you take over?
